医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利用人工智能的力量优化乳腺癌管理根据 Cell Press 12 月 12 日在《癌症趋势》杂志上发表的一篇评论文章，人工智能 (AI) 正在塑造乳腺癌筛查和降低风险策略的未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Harnessing-the-power-of-AI-to-optimize-breast-cancer-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Harnessing-the-power-of-AI-to-optimize-breast-cancer-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34f10f7a-e2ad-4fc6-b8c9-d10387d1b6b1 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 01:23:13 -0500 Harnessing the power of AI to optimize breast cancer management
遗传变异调节干扰素信号传导和疾病风险多年来，科学家们一直在寻找免疫系统机制的一个关键部分——干扰素途径——来寻找答案。在那里，当我们的细胞感知到感染时，它们会释放一种称为干扰素的蛋白质，警告其他细胞对抗病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/A-genic-variant-modulates-interferon-signaling-and-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/A-genic-variant-modulates-interferon-signaling-and-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fd9bf3a-7797-445a-b91a-fd318ab551da Fri, 13 Dec 2024 01:10:43 -0500 A genetic variant modulates interferon signaling and disease risk
深度学习改变 PDAC 诊断和治疗研究人员成功开发了一种深度学习模型，该模型使用组织病理学图像将胰腺导管腺癌（PDAC）（最常见的胰腺癌形式）分类为分子亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Deep-learning-transforms-PDAC-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Deep-learning-transforms-PDAC-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=662924f0-62b3-43e4-96b0-3451258cfc3b Fri, 13 Dec 2024 01:00:27 -0500 Deep learning transforms PDAC diagnosis and treatment
便携式 MRI 和 AI 以经济高效的精度改善阿尔茨海默病的诊断研究人员通过机器学习优化了便携式低场 MRI，以改善大脑形态测量和白质高信号检测，使阿尔茨海默病的诊断更容易且更具成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Portable-MRI-and-AI-improve-Alzheimere28099s-diagnosis-with-cost-efficient- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Portable-MRI-and-AI-improve-Alzheimere28099s-diagnosis-with-cost-efficient- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8a51c10-3a06-49d5-b8a7-712b6339a629 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 23:58:00 -0500 Portable MRI and AI improve Alzheimer’s diagnosis with cost-effective precision
皮肤作为免疫英雄：用自制抗体对抗感染研究人员揭示了皮肤如何通过专门的免疫结构自主产生抗体，维持微生物平衡并预防感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Skin-as-an-immune-hero-Fighting-infections-with-self-made-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Skin-as-an-immune-hero-Fighting-infections-with-self-made-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84c45ab4-83ca-4704-b0f6-d744f9392442 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 23:33:00 -0500 Skin as an immune hero: Fighting infections with self-made antibodies
研究人员对新冠病毒后亚型进行分类并揭示疫苗接种的保护作用研究人员确定了四种不同的新冠病毒后亚型，揭示了关键的风险因素，并强调了疫苗接种在减轻长期影响方面的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Researchers-classify-post-COVID-subtypes-and-uncover-vaccinatione28099s-protective-role.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Researchers-classify-post-COVID-subtypes-and-uncover-vaccinatione28099s-protective-role.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf9df947-a145-4d76-a416-756237b31373 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 23:13:00 -0500 Researchers classify post-COVID subtypes and uncover vaccination’s protective role
发现 LDL 清除的关键：apoB100-LDLR 结合的结构细节浮出水面研究人员揭示了 apoB100 与 LDL 受体相互作用的结构细节，为 LDL 二聚化和家族性高胆固醇血症的潜在治疗提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Key-to-LDL-clearance-uncovered-Structural-details-of-apoB100-LDLR-binding-emerge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Key-to-LDL-clearance-uncovered-Structural-details-of-apoB100-LDLR-binding-emerge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8604b7c1-d5b9-4618-814f-7565013b036e Thu, 12 Dec 2024 22:58:00 -0500 Key to LDL clearance uncovered: Structural details of apoB100-LDLR binding emerge
血细胞计数稳定性揭示了个性化护理的新途径研究人员发现，全血细胞计数设定点是稳定的、患者特异性的生物标志物，可以持续数十年，为个性化医疗和精确诊断提供了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Blood-count-stability-reveals-new-pathways-to-personalized-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Blood-count-stability-reveals-new-pathways-to-personalized-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bbee208-f04f-46e3-8c51-ed5e0d648525 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 22:38:00 -0500 Blood count stability reveals new pathways to personalized care
营养进步停滞：大多数国家落后于 2030 年目标全球实现营养目标的进展缓慢，很少有国家能够在 2030 年之前实现贫血、发育迟缓和儿童超重的目标，这凸显了制定长期、多部门战略的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Nutrition-progress-stalls-Most-nations-lag-behind-2030-goals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Nutrition-progress-stalls-Most-nations-lag-behind-2030-goals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8ae8048-933b-49d1-9a2e-18c67bcf7bdd Thu, 12 Dec 2024 21:19:00 -0500 Nutrition progress stalls: Most nations lag behind 2030 goals
新研究揭示巨大的疾病负担，全球疱疹感染激增全球 HSV-1 和 HSV-2 估计揭示了令人震惊的疾病负担，2020 年将有 4240 万新生殖器疱疹病例和 88 亿 GUD 人日，这凸显了改进预防策略的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Herpes-infections-soar-globally-as-new-study-reveals-massive-disease-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Herpes-infections-soar-globally-as-new-study-reveals-massive-disease-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c2f24fa-8015-4c9d-ae89-e05dc3f94abd Thu, 12 Dec 2024 21:00:00 -0500 Herpes infections soar globally as new study reveals massive disease burden
